text: (Munibuke) ubwo Musa yabwiraga abantu be ati “Yemwe bantu banjye! Mu by’ukuri, mwarihemukiye ubwo mwafataga akamasa (mwibumbiye) mukakagira ikigirwamana. Ngaho nimwicuze ku Muremyi wanyu, maze mwicane (abatarabangikanyije Allah muri mwe bice abamubangikanyije nk’igihano kuri bo); ibyo ni byo byiza kuri mwe imbere y’Umuremyi wanyu (aho gushyirwa mu muriro w’iteka).” Nuko Allah yakira ukwicuza kwanyu. Mu by’ukuri, ni we Uwakira ukwicuza, Nyirimbabazi
